alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 9:05PM CDT until June 10 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. .Occasional light rain showers over the next couple of days will should not affect river levels much. The general trend over the next week is for rivers to slowly recede. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Water reaches flood mitigation culverts on Riverside Road * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 630 PM CDT Monday, the stage was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday to a crest of 21.0 feet Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.4 feet on 05/31/2004. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
